plot: Set in the small southern town of Yellow Brook, a mystery ensues when a local resident is found shot dead in her kitchen. Everyone becomes a suspect within this tight knit circle of folk, until the puzzle unravels to an astonishing finale.
title: Yellow Brook
plot_es: Set in the small southern town of Yellow Brook, a mystery ensues when a local resident is found shot dead in her kitchen. Everyone becomes a suspect within this tight knit circle of folk, until the puzzle unravels to an astonishing finale.
